desc: Speaking in Styles aims to help Web designers learn the “language” that will be used to take their vision from the static comp to the live Internet. Many designers think that CSS is code, and that it’s too hard to learn. Jason takes an approach to CSS that breaks it down around common design tasks and helps the reader learn that they already think in styles–they just need to learn to speak the language.
title: Speaking in Styles: Fundamentals of CSS for Web Designers
